onboarding.title: Welcome to Auto Claude
onboarding.titleDescription: Let's get you set up in a few simple steps. Auto Claude uses AI to help you manage tasks, review code, generate roadmaps, and accelerate your development workflow.

apiConfiguration.title: API Configuration
apiConfiguration.description: Configure your Claude API key to enable AI-powered features.
apiConfiguration.claudeOAuthDescription: Sign in with your Anthropic account

connectProject.title: Connect a Project
connectProject.description: Point Auto Claude at a project directory to get started.
connectProject.selectDirectoryDescription: Choose a local project folder to analyze

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Auto Claude is ready to help you build better software. Start by creating your first task or exploring your project's codebase.

welcome.title: Welcome to Auto Claude
welcome.description: Get started by connecting a project. Auto Claude will help you manage tasks, generate roadmaps, review code, and more.
welcome.subtext: Point Auto Claude at a local project directory to get started.
